text: Sorry, no luck. Still trying to figure it out but I hate webpack.
So. The hs create function sets up the dependency compilation/management? Did I understand correctly?

`hs create function` creates a barebones serverless function without any dependency management from the looks of it.  `hs create webpack-serverless` provides a serverless function boilerplate with dependency management via npm and WebPack.
Ohh, now it makes sense. Thanks for the help.
